title: Value Of A Mantra
name: valueofamantra
content:
15000 years ago there was a powerful sage in india. He used to live in the Himalayas. He had a gurukul where the ancient science of yoga was being taught. One man came to him and asked for a mantra. He said ok you chant , Om Namah Shivaya . The man thought what's new in this I already knew this.He did nothing much.

On the same day one spiritual seeker came to him and said, O sage I bow to you again and again. I surrender myself to you. Please tell me what to do. 

The sage told him, you stay here and do three things. First look after the cows, second look after the trees , third look after the birds.Exactly after twelve years I will give you one mantra .The man started his service from that moment itself.

On the same day evening one rich man came to him and asked for help.Please give me one mantra. I have money but much trouble in my life. The Sage told him, 'make a list of all the money you earned in an unethical way by hurting others'. He prepared a list. The sage said leave it here and take one mantra.He did the same.Then sage told him, Come after one year . This man did exactly the same and came after one year. He was very happy, more wealthy than earlier.He was recommended to continue with the same mantra.

Twelve years passed. The first man did nothing by thinking,'this mantra is a common one and I can do it anytime'.

The person who was doing selfless service since twelve years, came to the sage and humbly asked for the mantra.He was given the same mantra. Only with a single chant he went into the trance of samadhi. Because he made himself ready with his service and dedication.

The third man came to the sage and asked, O Master, what more I can do, please suggest .He was ordered to construct twelve gurukulas with his huge money where the students can stay and plant 500 mango trees. With his selflessness service and practise, one day after three years he also attained a higher level spiritual realization and continued with his practice.

The value of a mantra depends on your dedication and the price you pay to receive that. Remember the more you pay may be in  physical , mental or material ways , you will get the more enhanced and quicker result. Nothing is free in this universe and the universe treats everyone equally. 

||Om||

title: Two Sages And A Lady
name: twosagesandalady
content:
Two sages were traveling by walk. Heavy rain started suddenly. They found a tree nearby and took shelter there. One lady was passing on that road. She was helpless and crying as the night was approaching and also she forgot the way. She was just thinking about Lord Shiva and walking each step very consciously but with fear.

A ray of hope came to her when she saw two sadhus.She came nearby and bowed to both of them. Her cloth was fully wet. One of the sages offered him his clothes and she changed it.She looked like a perfect sadhwi or a female sage. Then he offered him a place just below the tree where they planned for themselves .Both of them went little away and Sat there.

Another sage was thinking there must be something wrong. My sage brother got fallen. That's why he is showing very much interest in this woman. At the same time the sage who offered the clothes went into a deep state of meditation.

Another sage was acting just like he is also doing meditation. But He was thinking, I know you are thinking about that beautiful lady .He was opening his eyes again and again to check whether he is looking at that woman. Like that with full of thoughts he passed the night.In the morning she came to both of them and asked how and where she can return the clothes.She went in her way.

Both of them came to the gurukula. Then immediately the other sage came to complain against his fellow sage. Before he can say something , the guru asked can you just go to my room and bring my stick. He went there and saw the same clothes which were given to that lady last night.He could not understand anything. 

The master or the gurudeva said, It's not the act but it's your mind which never leaves you.I tested both of you. He did his duty thinking the lady as his mother and meditated for the full night.You judged him, you carried that woman in your mind.She is in your mind till now. It was me only. Focus on the purity of your mind , be divine conscious and do your duties selflessly.

These few lines from the Masters mouth brought tremendous changes in the life of that disciple and he became a great sage of his time.

||Om||
